description: The image shows a plate of freshly prepared pakoras, garnished with cilantro, served on a wooden table. The pakoras appear crispy and are likely made from vegetables and spices, typical of South Asian cuisine. In the background, there's a hint of a kitchen setting with a black stovetop and a spoon, suggesting a home-cooked meal.
poem:
In a cozy kitchen's gentle light,
A plate of pakoras comes to sight.
Golden brown with spices right,
On wooden table, what a delight!
Cilantro tops this tasty bite.
